price: (Nkͻmhyεni), di deε yɛayi ama woͻ no akyi, na si aboterε kosi sε Nyankopͻn bɛbu atεn, na Ɔne Atemmufoͻ no mu Ɔtemmufo papa no.
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَٱصۡبِرۡ حَتَّىٰ يَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-ittabiʿ mā yūḥā ilayka wa-iṣ'bir ḥattā yaḥkuma al-lahu wahuwa khayru al-ḥākimīna
